Class AbstractBulkSetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.fieldType.bulkSetters.AbstractBulkSetter

    public abstract class AbstractBulkSetter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBulkSetter

        The JSON configuration object for configuring the js control(s) containing the value
        Specified by:
        getSetterValueJsonConfig in interface IBulkSetter
        Parameters:
        baseName: - the name of the control: important by submit
        value: - the value to be set by rendering (first time or after a submit)
        dataSource: - defined only for lists (list for global lists, map for context dependent lists)
        labelMap: - defined only for context (project/issuType) dependent lists
        disabled: - whether the control is disabled
        personBean -
        locale -
